00020 #include <fstream>
00021 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00022 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RPropertyDef"
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 #include <rdkcore/object/objectmanager.h>
00026 
00027 #include "rpropertydef.h"
00028 
00029 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {
00030 
00031     RDK2_FACTORY(RPropertyDef);
00032     
00033     using namespace RDK2::RPrimitive;
00034     
00035     
00036     RPropertyDef::RPropertyDef() : Property("", ""), completeUrl("") { }
00037     
00038     void RPropertyDef::read(Reader* r) throw (RDK2::ReadingException)
00039     {
00040         r->startReading(getClassName());
00041             completeUrl = Url(r->readString());
00042             description = r->readString();
00043             options = (PropertyOptions) r->read_i32();
00044             isEnumB = (bool) r->read_i8();
00045             isLinkB = (bool) r->read_i8();
00046             linkTo = r->readString();
00047             defaultDoubleUnit = (RDouble::Unit) r->read_i32();
00048             string cn = r->readString();
00049             if (getObjectClassName() == "") setObjectClassName(cn);
00050         r->doneReading();
00051     }
00052     
00053     void RPropertyDef::write(Writer* w) const throw (RDK2::WritingException)
00054     {
00055         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00056             w->writeString(completeUrl);
00057             w->writeString(description);
00058             w->write_i32(options);
00059             w->write_i8(isEnumB);
00060             w->write_i8(isLinkB);
00061             w->writeString(linkTo);
00062             w->write_i32(defaultDoubleUnit);
00063             w->writeString(getObjectClassName());
00064         w->doneWriting();
00065     }
00066 
00067 }} // namespaces
